constanta.title: Vraja Mării in City
constanta.subtitle: Constanța Center
constanta.description: Located in the heart of the city, our center offers easy access to premium wellness services.

eforie.title: Vraja Mării Complex
eforie.subtitle: Eforie Sud
eforie.description: The main complex, situated on the seaside, offers the complete biohacking and relaxation experience.

hero.description: Get a thorough health check, like you've never experienced before. Receive all your results instantly.

yourBody.title: Your body
yourBody.description: Regular inspections are mandatory for cars on our roads, but in our healthcare system, we often wait until our bodies break down before taking action. So why not prioritise our health the same way?

yourFuture.title: Your future
yourFuture.description: By equipping our doctors with the best tools to take care of tracking your health, our doctor led model of care provides a better experience for everyone.

facilities.label: Our Facilities
facilities.title: Vraja Mării Facilities
facilities.description: Discover our world-class facilities designed for your complete wellness journey, from relaxation to recovery.

saltRoom.name: Salt Room
saltRoom.description: Therapeutic halotherapy sessions in a pristine salt-infused environment

finnishSauna.name: Finnish Sauna
finnishSauna.description: Traditional wood-fired sauna with authentic Finnish experience

relaxationPool.name: Relaxation Pool
relaxationPool.description: Heated mineral pool with panoramic sea views

cryotherapy.name: Cryotherapy Chamber
cryotherapy.description: Advanced whole-body cryotherapy for rapid recovery

infraredSauna.name: Infrared Sauna
infraredSauna.description: Deep-penetrating infrared heat therapy for detoxification

iceBath.name: Ice Bath
iceBath.description: Cold immersion therapy for inflammation reduction

massageRoom.name: Massage Suite
massageRoom.description: Private treatment rooms for therapeutic and relaxation massages

floatationTank.name: Floatation Tank
floatationTank.description: Sensory deprivation pods for deep meditation and recovery

restaurant.name: Sea View Restaurant
restaurant.description: Farm-to-table cuisine with stunning Black Sea panoramas

terrace.name: Sunset Terrace
terrace.description: Open-air lounge perfect for evening relaxation

offers.heroSubtitle: Exclusive packages for your wellness journey
offers.heroDescription: Discover our curated offers and packages designed to enhance your health and wellbeing at Vraja Mării.

offer1.title: Recovery Package
offer1.subtitle: Rebuild. Restore. Recover.
offer1.description: A comprehensive recovery program combining cryotherapy, infrared sauna, ice baths, and physiotherapy sessions. Designed for athletes and anyone recovering from injury or chronic fatigue.
offer1.includes: 5 cryotherapy sessions, 3 infrared sauna sessions, 2 ice bath sessions, 1 physiotherapy consultation

offer2.title: Endometriosis Wellness
offer2.subtitle: Relief. Balance. Wellbeing.
offer2.description: A specialised wellness package targeting endometriosis symptoms through a combination of floatation therapy, infrared heat therapy, therapeutic massage, and anti-inflammatory nutrition guidance.
offer2.includes: 4 floatation sessions, 3 infrared sauna sessions, 2 therapeutic massages, nutrition consultation

offer3.title: Couples Spa Day
offer3.subtitle: Reconnect. Relax. Recharge.
offer3.description: A full day for two with premium treatments including massage, pool access, sauna sessions, and a healthy dining experience by the sea.
offer3.includes: 2 massages, full-day pool access, sauna sessions, 2-course healthy lunch

offer4.title: Monthly Membership
offer4.subtitle: Unlimited. Unrestricted. Yours.
offer4.description: Full monthly access to all Vraja Mării facilities including sauna, pool, cryotherapy, recovery rooms, and member-exclusive workshops.
offer4.includes: Unlimited facility access, 2 monthly workshops, priority booking, member discounts

waitlist.heroDescription: Be among the first to experience our biohacking complex. Join the waitlist for priority access.
waitlist.benefit1: Get priority access to bookings and exclusive offers.
waitlist.benefit2: Be notified when we open reservations.

footer.cta: Take the first step in getting ahead of your health
